sentences.en: Recent reports found that lodging with a student of a different race may decrease prejudice and compel students to engage in more ethnically diverse friendships.
sentences.cn: 最近的报告发现，寄宿于不同种族的学生可能会减少偏见，并迫使学生建立更多不同种族的友谊。
大多数沙特人是阿拉伯人。

sentences.en: In the past few weeks, Kisumu has been ethnically cleansed.
sentences.cn: 在过去的数周内，卢奥人在基苏姆城进行了种族大清理。
